A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It was a disappointment; the way they depicted the original characters didn't really make much sense. The premise of the whole movie was a massive plot hole. (I'll try not to spoil it) but if you like car chases at 2km/hr for no reason lasting 2 and a bit hours perhaps you'll like this movie. Visually it produced 1 or 2 decent scenes but even then they felt forced. There was a huge lack of consistency both in plot and character decisions with very little logic or explanations. 

The kylo ren performance was decent I suppose.

I'd say it's around a 1.8/10.
